original_text: And he brought the family of Judah; and he took the family of the Zarhites: and he brought the family of the Zarhites man by man; and Zabdi was taken:
korean_text: 유다 족속을 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 세라 족속이 뽑혔고 세라 족속의 각 남자를 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 삽디가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: And he brought the family of Judah
and he took the family of the Zarhites
and he brought the family of the Zarhites man by man
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 스라지인 가족을 한 사람씩 불러냈고
